flawed_nl_solution:
The perimeter of the garden is 2 * 225 + 2 * 125 = {2*length} + {2*width} = <<2*225+2*125=7000>>7000 feet.
Minus the two gates, he will need at least 7000 - 3 - 10 = <<7000-3-10=6987>>6987 feet of fencing.

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 700, not 7000. It appears an extra zero was added to the number.
